content: hygge holidays cowl hygge holidays cowl - campfire knits november 2019 materials ●2 skeins of campfire knits dk yarn sample shown using bonfire base 231yds/100g ● one main color mc sample colorway winter cranberry ● one contrast color cc sample colorway toasted marshmallow ●size us 7 16-20 circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge ● 23 sts and 21 row per 4 ●beginning of row stitch marker ●tapestry needle or crochet hook for weaving in ends ●optional but helpful 7 additional stitch markers to note the start of each pattern repeat directions ●using mc cast on 144 stitches in your preferred method i like ​tillybuddy s cast on for ribbing ●work in knit 2 purl 2 rib for 6 row ●knit one row in mc ●knit one row in cc ●begin working charts in following order ● chart 1 ● chart 2 ● optional chart 1 if you want a taller cowl ●before you move to the top ribbing ● if ending your cowl with chart 2​ break cc yarn then knit one row in mc ● if ending your cowl with chart 1 ​ knit one row in cc break yarn then knit one row in mc ●work in knit 2 purl 2 rib for 6 row ●bind off in your preferred method and gently block hygge holidays cowl - campfire knits november 2019 chart 1 ​holiday star pattern chart 2 ​ evergreen forest pattern hygge holidays cowl - campfire knits november 2019
